Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.gui.components

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardScreen
    BoardScreen is a class in which the GUI-component of the board game is generated.
    Game
    Game is an abstract class that partially manages the activities linked to GamePreparation and RealGame phases.
    GameManual
    GameManual is a class in which the GUI-component of the game manual is generated.
    GamePreparation
    This class creates and manages GAME_PREPARATION phase layout.
    GodChoice
    GodChoice is a class in which the GUI-component of the GamePreparation game phase is generated.
    GodInfo
    GodInfo is a class used to give players information about God.
    GodScreen
    GodScreen is a class which manages the display of Gods during GodChoice gamePhase.
    InitialInfo
    InitialInfo is a class in which the component during before and during nicknames and colors choice is managed.
    PlayerNumberChoice
    PlayerNumberChoice is a class in which the first Gui-component of the game is defined.
    RealGame
    This class creates and manages REAL_GAME phase layout.
    WaitingForAMatch
    This class defines a waiting component.
